mapper.insert: insert into InMat_tbl( InMat_Order_No, InMat_Lot_No, InMat_No, InMat_Code, InMat_Qty, InMat_Unit_Price, InMat_Price, InMat_Client_Code, InMat_Date, InMat_Rcv_Clsfc, InMat_dInsert_Time, InMat_Modifier ) values ( #{InMat_Order_No}, #{InMat_Lot_No}, #{InMat_No}, #{InMat_Code}, #{InMat_Qty}, #{InMat_Unit_Price}, #{InMat_Qty} * #{InMat_Unit_Price}, #{InMat_Client_Code}, #{InMat_Date}, #{InMat_Rcv_Clsfc}, now(), #{InMat_Modifier} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.InMat_Order_No, A.InMat_Lot_No, A.InMat_No, A.InMat_Code, C.Product_Item_Name InMat_Name, B.LM_Qty InMat_Qty, A.InMat_Unit_Price, C.Product_Info_STND_1 InMat_Item_Stnd_1, C.Product_Info_STND_2 InMat_Item_Stnd_2, A.InMat_Client_Code, D.Cus_Name InMat_Client_Name, A.InMat_Date, A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc, E.Child_TBL_Type InMat_Rcv_Clsfc_Name FROM InMat_tbl A inner join LotMaster_tbl B on A.InMat_Lot_No = B.LM_LotNo inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.InMat_Code = C.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl D on A.InMat_Client_Code = D.Cus_Code inner join DTL_TBL E on A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = E.Child_TBL_No where B.LM_Qty > 0 and B.LM_WareHouse = (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 10 and Child_TBL_Type = '자재창고') and A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc != (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 17 and Child_TBL_Type = '입고반품')
